name: 劉宛育
objective:
The course attempts to give an introduction to methods of architectural design from aspects of both substantive knowledge and process skills. A large number of projects will be referred as examples.

課程相關訊息以課堂口頭說明為主。修課同學請加入課程FB社團：
https://www.facebook.com/groups/ntutarch155/

★ 未出席introduction者 恕不接受加選 ★
